author: Rob Braxman Tech
description:
The typical strategy of many interested in privacy is to jump to products like protonmail or tutanota. But without actually understanding the problem you're trying to solve, a move like this will likely yield no benefit for 99.9% of you. Here's an Email Strategy to maintain privacy, cybersecurity and to fight spam all at once and we will go throught it in detail.

-----------------------------------
BraX3 Privacy Phone is on pre-order on Indiegogo
https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/brax3-the-most-privacy-friendly-smartphone#/
-----------------------------------
Brax Virtual Phone, De-Googled Phones, BytzVPN, BraxMail, BraxRouters are available on https://brax.me. Sign in to the platform to see the store. You will not be asked for personal information to sign up.

I'm the Internet Privacy Guy. I'm a public interest technologist. I'm here to educate. You are
title: Here's a Practical Email Plan that has Nothing to Do With Email Encryption
